      • checkPermission

        public boolean checkPermission​(java.lang.String sourceId,
                               PermType perm,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> targetIdList)
        Check if a source is accessible to a target.
        参数:
        sourceId - ACL source entity ID
        perm - Necessary permission
        targetIdList - List of targets
        返回:
        True if the document is accessible
